comment: He is a very nice man! He really cares about his students and will help you in any way he can. He can be unclear at times with assignments but he is more than happy to elaborate as much as needed so you know what he's looking for. He loves to lecture, I felt at times like I was in a high school class. Pretty easy though, I made an A in the class

I learned a lot.  I don't think he was very clear with directions or expectations many times, but just ask, ask, ask. Not a difficult class, but you have to go to class and do the work. Lots of options for extra credit points.
Nice teacher, easy A! I would recommend to other ECE majors!
It is a lot of work. I've learned a good bit, but I don't like him as a teacher.

He is a great prof. He is very clear on what he expects and you can tell that he enjoys teaching. He is willing to proof read any assignment before you turn it in. He is very nice, Easy A...just attend class.
A lot of busy work, but easy A if you keep up with them. Will need clarifying on most projects, but easy A at the end.

Not too hard of a teacher, but doesn't explain assignments well.  After he explained something there were always a bunch of questions for like the next two weeks. I definitely worked for my A in the class.
Loved this teacher.  Very informative, actually learned the material with little to no work at all.  Just attend his class and you'll do great.  Open note tests!
Nice teacher, do all of his work and attend class and you'll do fine. Careful, gives great grades at first but becomes vigorously difficult with grading toward end.
